summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4381 for the improvement of Seneca Street from 4th Avenue to Harvard Avenue; by the installation of a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51835, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
